title: Episode 4: Shelly on a Mission
description:
Today I talk with my friend Shelly about her experience with missions and how the view of missions has changed her prospective and where it has led her to in her life. We also stray into the idea of Orthodoxy and how it is shaping the way Shelly see's mission. 

When Helping Hurts: https://www.amazon.com/When-Helping-Hurts-Alleviate-Yourself/dp/0802409989
